amendment.description: Amendment sought to decrease the funding for Diplomatic and Consular Programs in the Department of State by $5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce by $5,000,000 for Diplomatic and Consular Programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garrett (NJ) amendment (A014) Failed by recorded vote: 75 - 344 (Roll no. 48).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A014) offered by Mr. Garrett (NJ).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
